name: Signal C4V by Edward Barber and Jay Osgerby x Galerie kreo

metadata.name: Signal C4V #02
metadata.created_by: Edward Barber and Jay Osgerby x Galerie kreo
metadata.description:
In February 2022, the designers Edward Barber and Jay Osgerby premiered their first solo exhibition with Galerie kreo, with a collection of lamps entitled “Signals”. The collection highlighted the designers’ longstanding passion for colour and form, and comprised 8 different models — including floor lights, wall lights, and ceiling lights.

  “Signal C4V” is the ninth and last model of “Signals” — existing exclusively online, in the form of an NFT. As the first NFT for both Edward Barber and Jay Osgerby and Galerie kreo, "Signal C4V” participates in introducing a new phase to the digital arena for design.

attributes.value: Edward Barber and Jay Osgerby x Galerie kreo
